alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cheyenne and southeastern Morrill Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 844 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms near and south of Bridgeport, or 32 miles southeast of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Lodgepole, Dalton, Gurley, Sunol, Northport, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Court House And Jail Rocks, Bridgeport State Recreation Area and Broadwater. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 73 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
